text: Hidalgo Ramon Vega (February 1, 1934 - May 7, 2014) was a Chilean politician and military personal. He was commander in chief of the Chilean Air Force. In 1998 he was appointed institutional senator, a position he held starting in 1998. He left office in 2006. Hidalgo was born in Santiago, Chile. He died there from heart failure, aged 80. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Chilean generals Category:Politicians from Santiago
